divs: Sighting Detailsi was working on my firends car as i em a mechanic by trade when.I look at the south.south east sky when i noticed a light orb move across the sky was not a plane becuse it had no navigation lights flowed it with my eyes also my friend was with me at the time of the event as it moved across the sky it got bright red and then white then dimed a little the whent out completly and no it was not a meteor or any space junk re-entering our atmosphere nor a low altitude satellite fly by....so thats my story
